content:
I am trying to build the following dockerfile for the https://github.com/Textualize/textual.git repository. It should install any necessary dependencies and then run tests to confirm that installation succeeded:
# Use the official Python base image
FROM python:3.10

# Set the working directory
WORKDIR /app

# Copy the entire repository into the container
COPY . /app/

# Install Poetry
RUN pip install poetry

# Create a virtual environment and install dependencies
RUN poetry config virtualenvs.create false \
    && poetry install --no-interaction --no-ansi

# Run the test suite to verify installation
RUN pytest
